name: Valkyrio Token
short_description: Valkyrio is a blockchain-based game inspired by a manga.
description: Valkyrio is a blockchain-based game inspired by a manga. At Valkyrio, players will immerse themselves in the role of a humanity representative by recruiting fighters, forging the weapons, killing monsters, and challenging Gods. At Valkyrio, we believe that having a unique fighter and/or weapon is one of the ways the game can be appealing and engaging, but also rewarding to the players.
